description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hit a Home Run with your Avatar! Features: Addicting Gameplay, Global High Scores, Large Avatar Crowds, and much more! Smash targets and send the ball deep on your way to the top of the Global Highscore List!  Home Run Challenge is for gamers of all ages and skill levels.
